title: Feel Me plz
body: Was Silver 3 now Brozen 3 {{item:3070}} in a week {{item:3151}}

replies.body:
Hey man,
That is very unfortunate, I'm sorry you dropped so hard. If you would like any help with improving and climbing back up, I'd be happy to help out. If you just want to talk, I don't mind listening, just add me in game ^ - ^

Yours sincerely, 
Talwyn
yeah thanks ^.^ really nice to heard from this server, coz as u know every 1 trolls or afk coz some1 insult some one :(
i was once a silva but am now a bronzie, i feel your pain {{item:3070}}
point? silver is worse than bronze, and it doesnt get much better till plat 3+
That's impressive. Not in a good way either...
u need this kind of talent u know :P {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
Just losing streak never pay attention, and keep losing {{item:3070}}
